movies.title: My Santa
movies.plot: Single mom Jen Robbins, who is a writer of human interest stories for the newspaper in the small town where she has lived all her life, lost the Christmas spirit ever since her ex-husband Paul walked out on her six years ago on Christmas Eve, when their son Eric was only one year old. Jen, however, wants to make a happy life for Eric, who still believes in Santa Claus and in the magic and spirit of Christmas. Part of that happiness is finding a man to be that father figure that Eric never had. Jen thinks that Sam Franklin, the new investigative reporter at the newspaper, might be that man. But despite her disdain for Christmas, she seems also to be falling under the spell of Chris, the mysterious man who is the shopping center Santa Claus. What Jen is unaware of, but what Eric truly believes, is that Chris is really Kris Kringle Jr., the heir apparent to the magic of Christmas. Chris has for the last several years during the Christmas season stayed in one town looking for that special...
movies.simplePlot: Single mom Jen Robbins, who is a writer of human interest stories for the newspaper in the small town where she has lived all her life, lost the Christmas spirit ever since her ex-husband ...

biography.bio: Samaire Armstrong was born on October 31, 1980 in Tokyo, Japan as Samaire Rhys Armstrong. She is an actress, known for It's a Boy Girl Thing (2006), Just My Luck (2006) and Stay Alive (2006).
biography.name: Samaire Armstrong

biography.bio: Matthew William Lawrence was born in Abington, Pennsylvania, to Donna (Shaw), a personnel manager, and Joseph Lawrence, an insurance broker. He is the middle brother of three, with Andrew Lawrence the youngest and Joey Lawrence the oldest. At age three, his mother started to bring him into NY city with her and his brother Joseph. They would go often for singing and dancing lessons as well as commercial auditions. Matty, known to family/friends, naturally wanted to get into the entertainment industry like his older brother and developed a passion for the arts. At age 4 he booked 2 national commercials and was on his way. Finally after many years of commuting, he and his family moved out to Los Angeles. This is where he attended high school and then USC. He excelled in biology and the sciences. All the while working as an actor. He now resides in a suburb of Los Angeles.
biography.name: Matthew Lawrence

biography.bio: Julie Brown was born on August 31, 1954 in Van Nuys, California, USA as Julie Ann Brown. She is an actress and producer, known for Earth Girls Are Easy (1988), Camp Rock (2008) and Clueless (1995). She was previously married to Ken Rathjen and Terrence E. McNally.
biography.name: Julie Brown

biography.bio: Jim O'Heir was born on February 4, 1962 in Chicago, Illinois, USA. He is an actor, known for Parks and Recreation (2009), Seeking a Friend for the End of the World (2012) and Accepted (2006).
biography.name: Jim O'Heir

biography.bio: Ben Gavin grew up in San Antonio, Texas. As an accomplished athlete, Ben received a division 1 baseball scholarship to the University of Texas, where his love for acting led him to become a drama major. Shortly after college he moved to Los Angeles where he began aggressively pursuing an acting career. In 2011, Ben made his film debut in J.J. Abrams, Super 8 (2011) as Assistant Deputy Danny Milner. He has also acted in several other independent shorts and features and continues to study with noted acting coaches and directors. His passion for entertainment is not limited to the screen or stage, as Ben is also a very avid singer songwriter.
biography.name: Ben Gavin

biography.bio: Dooley was a keen cartoonist as a youth and drew a strip for a local paper in Parkersburg, West Virginia. He joined the Navy before discovering acting while at college. Moving to New York, he soon found success as a regular on the stage. Also having an interest in comedy, Dooley was a stand-up comedian for five years, as well as having brief stints as a magician and as a clown. Not afraid of trying different areas of entertainment, he has also worked as a writer. After appearing in many movies, including most notably Popeye (1980), Dooley has appeared as recurrent characters on various shows, including My So-Called Life (1994), Dream On (1990), Grace Under Fire (1993), and Star Trek: Deep Space Nine (1993).
biography.name: Paul Dooley

biography.bio: Gabe O'Mara is an actor, known for Masters of Sex (2013), My Santa (2013) and Finders Keepers (2014).
biography.name: Gabe O'Mara

biography.bio: Channing Chase is known for her work on Evan Almighty (2007), Chances Are (1989) and Path to War (2002).
biography.name: Channing Chase

biography.bio: Annie Little is an actress, known for Argo (2012), Mad Men (2007) and Shameless (2011).
biography.name: Annie Little

biography.bio: Jeremy Scott Johnson is an actor and writer, known for Modern Family (2009), Community (2009) and Men at Work (2012).
biography.name: Jeremy Scott Johnson

biography.bio: Loryn Shay Charbonnier is an actress, known for My Santa (2013), Love at the Christmas Table (2012) and Kensho at the Bedfellow (2017).
biography.name: Loryn Shay Charbonnier

biography.bio: Luc Charbonnier is an actor, known for Love at the Christmas Table (2012), My Santa (2013) and Duke (2013).
biography.name: Luc Charbonnier

biography.bio: For the past 20 years, Dave has captivated audiences in virtually every performance medium available - especially television. As an actor, Dave has appeared in several hit television programs including Criminal Minds, Parenthood, The Mentalist, Revenge and, most recently, Black-ish. Dave also had contract roles on two soap operas. On All My Children, Dave was the heart-breaking Mike Gordon, the center of a love triangle between Mimi and Derek. On Another World, he was the tough-talking chief of detectives, Billy Cooper. In addition to national series television, Dave has also appeared in dozens of commercials and infomercials, and did well over a hundred voice-overs. Dave began his hosting career as an anchor on HBO Entertainment News and followed that with a stint as the host of Nine Broadcast Plaza on WWOR in New York. For 13 years, he was one of the top program hosts for QVC, and most recently, he joined the premium lifestyle network, ShopNBC, as a Senior Program Host - the "go to guy" for all things for the consumer!. In 2008, responding to hosting requests from consumer electronics companies, Dave created the Dr Cool Tech(TM) brand. As Dr Cool Tech, Dave funnels his passion for all things electronic into a showcase for products that, to some, may seem complicated, complex or dull. Dave makes them simple, easy to understand, and lots of fun! Dave holds a Bachelor of Science degree from Penn State University, where he played Free Safety for the legendary Joe Paterno.
biography.name: David L. King

biography.bio: Michael was born in Elmira, New York. He studied with the legendary acting teacher, Stella Adler, for 3 years and also with Mario Siletti at The National Shakespeare Company. Married director, Roger Stigliano, on June 20, 2008, after 27 years together. They have two daughters, Zoe, born 2000 and Stella, born 2004 and a son, Dexter, born 2008.
biography.name: Michael Waite
